description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
	New Feature
SLIDESNET-29080	Add support for rendering text in Hebrew language on thumbnails and PDF

	Investigations
SLIDESNET-33247	Aspose.Total License result in corrupt PPT
SLIDESNET-33253	Presentation takes immense amount of time and processing to load
SLIDESNET-33255	Extra space between portions

	Bugs
SLIDESNET-15306	Embedded OLE Object size changes in PPT when selected in MS PowerPoint
SLIDESNET-21617	Aspose.Slides .Net is looking for Aspose.Cells .Net version 5.1.2 dll and not working for 5.1.4
SLIDESNET-29799	System.Argument Exception on accessing PPT with PresentationEx
SLIDESNET-29804	System.Format Exception on accessing PPT with PresentationEx
SLIDESNET-30624	Chart data and labels missing in exported PDF
SLIDESNET-30886	Images failed to get rendered in exported PDF using .NET 4.0 dll
SLIDESNET-31160	Key should be shown at the bottom not the side.
SLIDESNET-32098	Exception while loading PPTX
SLIDESNET-32169	PPT to PDF conversion chart labels issue
SLIDESNET-32266	Wrong coordinate shapes on thumbnail
SLIDESNET-32553	IndexOutofRange Exception on exporting to PDF
SLIDESNET-32577	Grey box appearing in the generated thumbnails
SLIDESNET-32578	The text for the shape rendered upside down
SLIDESNET-33131	Setting chart labels visibility to false does not take effect
SLIDESNET-33169	Wrong PDF-file structure
SLIDESNET-33268	PDF files generated are much larger than the original PPTX
SLIDESNET-33269	Out of memory error when converting PPTX file into PDF
SLIDESNET-33276	Aspose.Slides.sln is not compiling under Debug|NET 1.1
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET 6.1.0
